name: Haunted Lighthouse (twinkietalks)
description:
This is a spooky 2d top down shooter. 

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

Modifications made:

- Added a custom tileset for the levels

- Added custom music

- Added new Player and Enemy Sprites

- Added custom Main Menu Background

Credits: 

Main Menu Music by Scott Buckley  www.scottbuckley.com.au

Level Music By GigaKoops  https://gigakoops.bandcamp.com

Art Credits:

"TrueCynder" - tilesets

Stephen Challener (Redshrike) - tilesets
